title: Enacts the tax relief on energy act; appropriation
summary: Enacts the tax relief on energy act; relates to the tax on furnishing of utility services; provides a sales and compensating use tax exemption on Energy Star appliances; provides for a heating credit for qualifying senior citizens living in leased housing; creates the STAR energy rebate program; establishes a clean energy production credit; provides for small business energy tax reduction; provides a tax credit on qualified fuel cell electric generating equipment expenditures; appropriation.
actClause: AN ACT enacting the tax relief on energy act; to amend the tax law, in relation to the tax on the furnishing of utility services; in relation to providing a sales and compensating use tax exemption on Energy Star appliances; in relation to a heating credit for qualifying senior citizens living in leased housing; to create the STAR energy rebate program; in relation to establishing a clean energy production credit; in relation to small business energy tax reduction; in relation to credit against the tax imposed on qualified fuel cell electric generating equipment expenditures; and making an appropriation for the STAR energy rebate program
